categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Mariin was a female Human who was a lieutenant in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War with the Galactic Republic, when she was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock.
Lieutenant Mariin appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Taris Modification Commendations vendor on Vaiken Spacedock.
